overview: Comfortless is a drama/thriller film about a girl named Rebecca(Madison Sturges) who falls in love with Thomas(Jared Battle), a troubled teenager with a dark side.  When Thomas attacks another guy for just talking to Rebecca, her friend Anna(Madeline Smith) tries to convince her to stay away from Thomas.  Rebecca recalls her experiences with Dr. Williams(Jo Ann Clark) and attempts to move past her traumatizing experience.
tagline: When a girl meets the wrong boy, the harrowing experience to survive becomes traumaitizing.
title: Comfortless
